Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • pvz.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the player playing the the game it keeps track of the current score, sun points and level
    Since:
    1.7
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Christopher Nguyen
